summary.value: Embrace the currents and seize your destiny!

system.description:
ALSO: Cutlass, Sailor, Seafarer

Born amidst the ebb and flow of tranquil waters, the Angler shares a bond with the aquatic realm. With rod in hand and a profound connection to the depths, they navigate treacherous seas, casting their fate upon the shimmering surface. Masters of finesse and patience, they draw power from the mysterious creatures that dwell beneath, channeling the very essence of water itself.

ANGLER FREE BENEFITS
  • Permanently increase your maximum Inventory Points by 2.

ANGLER SKILLS

@UUID[Compendium.fabula-ultima-homebrew.homebrew-skills.Item.Nab6k6o0N5kJEVov]{Fishing} (SL6)

You may use an action to fish out of nowhere and get benefits based on the fish caught. On a success, if you are able to equip the fish, you have the option to do a free attack with it, or trigger the effects of the fish if it is a Discovery, or store up to two fish in your inventory for later use.

Alternatively, you may use the Attack action and equip up to two fish from your inventory before attacking. If you are holding two fishes or a fish and a weapon, you may choose to do two weapon fighting if applicable. If you equip other types of fish, you can choose to trigger the effects instead of performing an attack.

You may store up to 【SL × 2】 fish in your inventory and you may fish up to 【SL】 times per scene.

@UUID[Compendium.fabula-ultima-homebrew.homebrew-skills.Item.1fCaY2ogHQ9PMFJ1]{Improved Fishing}

Reduce your fishing die size by 1 (up to a minimum of d6) and Unique-rank bait will not be lost on a 7+.

@UUID[Compendium.fabula-ultima-homebrew.homebrew-skills.Item.akFeDTKm7alzKanM]{Meshwork} (SL2)

You may perform the Inventory action and spend 3 Inventory Points to create a two-handed melee thrown weapon known as a Fishing Net (see below). The weapon will crumble to pieces as soon as you create a new Fishing Net. Upon creating a net, you perform a free attack with it. If this attack hits, choose one option: Reduce one enemy's next attack or offensive spell check by 【SL】, or improve one of your ally’s next attack or offensive spell check by 【SL】, or fish up to 【SL】 fish and store it immediately in your inventory. The first two effects do not stack.

WEAPON ACCURACY DAMAGE QUALITY
Fishing Net【DEX + INS】+ 1【HR + 4】 physicalTwo-handed ⬩ Melee ⬩ No Quality

@UUID[Compendium.fabula-ultima-homebrew.homebrew-skills.Item.LIZqJawYLDxU7exx]{Reel It In!}

When you hit an enemy with a Fishing Net, you may “reel in” the enemy, triggering an Opposed Check dependent on your narration. On a success, you may choose to do one out of the two options: If the enemy is in cover from someone using the Guard action, remove cover from that enemy. Or, steal 2 Inventory Points from the enemy.

Note that this would only make it so that the one who is covered from the Guard action can be targeted again. The rest of the benefits of the Guard action will still apply.

@UUID[Compendium.fabula-ultima-homebrew.homebrew-skills.Item.MjH3YagE4nfW76yC]{There Once Was A Ship…} (SL5)

You are able to communicate with creatures of Aquatic origin.

While resting in an area, you can sing sea shanties with the group to gain a party wide effect that is able to be used once by each of your allies: Your next HP or MP cost is reduced by 【SL × 2】. If multiple characters have this Skill, the effects are not cumulative.

This can be stacked with camp activities.
